name: osu! dark transparent tweaks
description: This style provides tweaks the style made by user 288169, which can be found here: style 111979. I used this style, and I liked it, but felt it lacked some features. Some elements weren't skinned and others could use improvement. This skin is meant as an extension to that style. Please remember that you need user 288169's style! This won't work without!
additional_info: Features v1.0: -Fixes for various elements that weren't skinned, making them look better and readable -New menu -Changed osu! logo -Moved and skinned the media/support buttons -Making playstats connected to the main body -Fixed google search bar v1.1: -Footer removal v1.2: -Made text on graph popup readable -New menu type: fixed at top of screen! v1.3: -Improvements for google search -Improvements for wiki -Making code tag look a little like Sublime Text -Make autocomplete readable v1.4: -Fix bug in top menu -Choose color for header -Choose color for pp numbers -Making /pages/include/profile-leader.php look pretty (in case someone uses it) v1.4.1: -Fixed small bugs v1.5: -Improved streams page (more to come in this version) v1.5.1 (2015-11-21): -Fixed news articles not getting skinned Planned features: -Skinning unskinned elements -Applying some CSS3-animation magic to the top buttons (if possible) -User requests -Allow choosing between osu! logos. (need permission from creator, I'm already on thin ice)
